tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gait_analysis_data (
  participant_id INT,
  gait_speed FLOAT,
  stride_length FLOAT,
  cadence INT,
  step_width FLOAT,
  stride_width FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE gait_data (
  gait_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  date_of_analysis DATE,
  stride_length FLOAT,
  cadence INT,
  stance_duration FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE abnormalities (
  abnormality_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gait_id INT REFERENCES gait_data(gait_id),
  type_of_abnormality VARCHAR(50),
  severity VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE gait_analysis_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stride_length FLOAT,
    step_duration FLOAT,
    cadence INT,
    gait_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    stride_length FLOAT,
    step_count INT
);
